## Education and Work Experience

### Current Education and Employment

* My name is Matthew Curran, I am a second year student at the Columbia University Mailman School of Public health getting my Masters in Epidemiology with a certificate in Applied Biostatistics. I expect to graduate in May 2020.

* While studying at Columbia, I am working at the New York City Department of Health conducting foodborne surveilence. Primarily for Salmonella and Shigella.

### Previous Employment

* Previously I worked in Baltimore for a Healthcare System called MedStar Health as a Simulation Specialist for two and a half years after graduating from Pennsylvania State University.

### Previous Education

* While at Penn State I double majored in Forensic Science and Immunology Infectious Diseases with a minor in Biochemistry and Molecular Biology.
